```{r}
install.packages("lubridate")
library(lubridate)

df_first <- data.frame(age = c(10,20,30),height = c(120,140,160),birth = c("20100201","20110522","20090430"))

df_second <- data.frame(age = c(10,20,30),height = c(120,140,160),birth = c("2010_02_01","2011_05_22","2009_04_30"))

df_third <- data.frame(age = c(10,20,30),height = c(120,140,160),birth = c("01022010","22052011","30042009"))

df_first

str(df_first)


ymd("20100201")
dmy("01022010")
mdy("09132001")


df_third$birth <- dmy(df_third$birth)
df_first$birth <- ymd(df_first$birth)
df_second$birth <- ymd(df_second$birth)

str(df_third)
str(df_second)
str(df_first)

```
